comment: If you specify default channels, plugins without a channel list will only respond in these channels
LogLevel one of trace, debug, info, warn, error
ExternalPlugins will cause the bot to look for these extra <pluginname>.json files. If it's not listed here it won't be active

ProtocolConfig.comment: MaxMessageSplit specifies the maximum number of messages to break a message into when it's too long (>4000 char)
